properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border; Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI; Lake Huron from Port Austin to Harbor Beach 5NM Off Shore to the US/Canadian border; Lake Huron from Port Sanilac to Port Huron 5NM Off Shore to US/Canadian border; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 10:18AM EST until January 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 28 knots from the south
with gusts up to 36 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 8 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 11 feet.

* WHERE...The southern third of Lake Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 10 AM EST
Saturday with the largest waves expected around 11 AM EST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY
